notes.note: Improved web page painting performance by avoiding redundant calculations during paint
Compatibility fixes for the upcoming Android Q release

[Support W3C Web Authentication API][0] for passwordless-logins to compatible websites

[0]: https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/API/Web_Authentication_API
Properly support BT601, BT709 and BT2020/2100 colorspaces on all platforms
Unified existing locales (bn-BD, bn-IN) under a single Bengali (bn) localization
Removed unmaintained languages: Assamese (as), English - South Africa (en-ZA), Maithili (mai), Odia (or)

system_requirements:
## Operating systems
 - Android 4.1
 - Above versions

## Requirements
 - 50 MB internal storage
 - 384 MB of RAM
 - display at least 320 pixels high and 240 pixels wide
title: Firefox for Android 68.0beta Beta
